showerReviews.reviewText: $15 overnight parking not bad $10 cold shower checked 3 showers all cold water sink would have 30sec of warm water then cold. Will not stop on purpose here..

I called to ask about washer and dryers and price of showers. Then I ask is it paid parking,lady said "yes ma'am" I then said "wait going to wash,dry,shower and eat THEN you going to charge for parking too. This is absolute greed I pray in ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Really, Pilot?  You‚Äôre going to give the women two whole shower rooms to use the restroom but us men have to use the porta-crappers outside?? ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and unprofessional staff I've ever encountered at a pilot . Waiting 2+ hours on a shower while the staff is walking around dancing with loud bluetooth speakers hanging around their necks . I can promise you that not one of these people can ‚Ä¶

Clean place plenty of parking the parking lot is smooth but I just showered in shower number 3 and there is 0 cold water. I take cold showers and haven't had a hot shower in years and it was disgusting

Spots are spacious, plenty of free parking. Wait times for a shower can suck during mid-afternoon but unlike other truck stops, there's a hard working employee watching the showers and cleaning them immediately after use. Plus an iHop
I happen to have busted water pipes recently and decided to use the shower at the local Pilot Flying J. ‚Ä¶

Great place except for the showers!!! Always loved stopping here because it‚Äôs one of the most updated, cleanest around & has lots of food choices in the area. However, took a shower that was disgusting!!! The room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ your all just ignorant. This is how pilots are it's why I stop. It is a classic nice place with lots off food options with in .5mile walk. It is exactly what I expected when I walked in good people nice place clean shower nothing to fancy.

Tina the cashier was very helpful and kind to help me.  Shower had big nice water pressure.
Floor had sticky old gum on sink floor stuck to my flip flops.  Toilet roll holder needed wiped clean.
‚Ä¶ This place is filthy. Shower had mold on ceiling, flys and the vent was covered in dust. ‚Ä¶
Great store. Plenty of truck parking. Gracious clerk allowed me a shower tonight after finding out the one I had on my app had expired. Thanks young lady for your kindness!!!!

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: About 5 showers were open and dirty and not cleaned, even the one that was assigned to me as a clean and ready shower. Are you serious?

It's probably the worst TA/Petro in the country. The showers are unclean, and you will find hairs all over the shower. The staff is about half and half as far as their professional courtesy. If you are not experiencing racial prejudice, ‚Ä¶

My husband is a trucker, and a very polite one at that. He is there right now and just attempted TWICE to pay for a shower. Each time he attempted to buy a shower was with a different woman behind the counter and BOTH OF THEM were extremely ‚Ä¶

I have been to travel centers all across the us. Today was my 1st at TA. Was shocked when I played for my shower. $14. They must have special water. Most I've ever payed was12. The shower room wasn't clean and water didn't stay hot. I won't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of yourselves for removing restaurants across the country to put in Popeyes. This facility had a decent shower on this visit but the kiosk needs to fixed or replaced. You guys call yourselves Travel centers of America but a lot of your ‚Ä¶
Nice clean showers. It was nice going in there at 3am, no problem. Nice staff, water pressure could have been better, but heck, it was a clean shower, can't comain really!
NO Restaurant as advertised.  No coffee made, no hot dogs cooked, and staff just didn't seem to care.  Only good thing was the shower was clean with hot water and good pressure.
Clean showers no lime or soap scum all over the shower thank you very much for providing the service I paid for. Great staff.
No more full service restaurant,  just a Nasty Popeyes.  Always able to park here, and shower is clean and hot.
Great place to stop and sleep on a long trip, used the bathroom shower and grab some food.

showerReviews.reviewText: Upon entering the store with the intent to purchase a shower, I encountered two employees conversing between each other me standing in between them. I did not want to interrupt their conversation so as I am reaching for my rewards card in ‚Ä¶
A. It's really annoying when there's a motion detecting light switch timer that only has a 60 fuse while you're trying to shower (FYI it was #3 management), see video for quick hack ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll ever visit. Inside and out. I gotta give it to the crew working there because as soon as I stepped in the shower i started to wonder if this was a new facility they just built. Thats how clean it was in there. That is also plenty ‚Ä¶

The Mgr. There allowed a snaggertooth man who cleans the shower to call me a gay slur in front of him doing a heated argument over check fees after I purchase fuel. Very unprofessional and he tried getting me arrested after I called them a ‚Ä¶

Beautiful New Location,.. Mold growing around the soap holder in the showers. See the black around the edges? That‚Äôs mold, very poorly maintained. Very easy to clean,.. someone not doing their job. This is shower #5 you are looking at.

Very nice addition a long awaited Love's truck  stop. I've enjoyed the a hot shower the Godfather Pizza needs improvement but and the Hardee's is Awesome no compliments grate layout in and out great job guy keep up.the good work üôèüëçüòè ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ employees to be nice. Uh huh and grunts are not proper responses to customers saying have a nice day and thank you. The girl at the shower desk never said a word giving me a shower.  Just a grunt when I said thank you. The girl at the other ‚Ä¶
Make sure you lock the safety lock on the shower, love stuff will double book the shower.. I was have naked another driver walked in..
40 minutes for a shower,,, at 11:30 at night is ridiculous!!! 5 employees only 1 working,,, very slow!!!
Clean store clean bathroom n shower no place for Handicapped wheelchair accessible nice staff open 24 hrs

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ have to wait long just to use a clean restroom.  The shower rooms he cleaned were nice and bright, and you could definitely tell they were well cleaned by the way they looked and smelled.  It reminded me of the old days of how the shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ very disappointed. I was at the Flying J on August 18, 2025. I was going into the shower and male worker decided to come in and assault me. I reported to Pilot and Flying J corporate  office.I did a police report and still. I had not ‚Ä¶

I hate leaving bad reviews,they have plenty of truck parking,I was happy to get a spot right away but the shower was a disappointment,the cleaning person was just standing in the back chilling on their phone and never cleaned the shower,I ‚Ä¶
A lot of parking space very clean.you can buy your breakfast  lunch  dinner and shower very convenient nice place
Did my 10 hour break there. Use their shower and it's the worst one I've ever seen in the area. Dust all over the fan and the air vents and on the floor nobody cleans up showerroom.

The manager Michael was AWESOME! My husband and I stopped in for a shower and food. He was very sweet and professional! He actually made us feel he cared about us truckers and having clean facilities which can be rare. This man deserves a ‚Ä¶

Restroom and shower was decent but Denny‚Äôs was a mess. We waited an hour for a to go order only to be disappointed by the appearance and finding out they gave our meal away twice. My hash browns were burnt and appeared to be eaten. I wish I ‚Ä¶
Disgusting shower experience here shower #4 was so dirty and full of hair and dirt all over the walls all the way up to the ceiling this was the nastiest shower we ever had.
Pumps clean shower are up but only 4 showers are working right now
Shower is freshly renovated ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs nice and clean with tons of park space

locations.content: Walton Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking is 20 dollars for 24hrs and shower is 15 dollars. It's clean and shower are nice. It's right across from the walmart dc
Foreign owned. $20 to park, $15 for a shower. By the looks of the truck stop, the showers can‚Äôt be worth $15.

$15 to park $12 for shower, unfortunately I had to do both since I delivered next door to WM DC with only an hour left on my 14 clock  around rush hour & next morning I took a shower only because I didn't had a preplan or load yet and ‚Ä¶

Terrible $20.00 parking every 12 hrs and 15.00 for shower. If you move from your paid parking spot you lose it and have to pay again. Stay away from this place! Greedy only take money to send back home
